meanings.definition: A type of fragrance or perfume.
meanings.sent1: I love the sweet smell of my colog.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new colog that smells like flowers.
meanings.sent3: The colog made the room smell like a garden.
meanings.sent4: Her colog was a bouquet of scents.
meanings.sent5: The colog enveloped me in a cloud of fragrance.

meanings.definition: To apply fragrance or perfume to oneself.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, she would colog herself before going out.
meanings.sent2: He cologs his neck with a refreshing scent.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally cologed her clothes instead of her skin.
meanings.sent4: He cologs his wrists like an artist painting a canvas.
meanings.sent5: She carefully cologs her pulse points for a lasting scent.
